description: This file defines a ViewModel and a Composable function for a user profile screen in an Android app. It interacts with a TransactionRepository to fetch goal data and displays profile information and budget goals using Jetpack Compose UI components.

classes.name: ProfileViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel that manages user profile data, fetching goals from the repository and exposing them as state.

methods.name: ProfileScreen
methods.description: Composable function that displays user profile information along with a list of budget goals.

methods.name: <constructor>
methods.description: Constructor for ProfileViewModel that initializes the repository and goals state.
